screen_desc: This screenshot shows the sign-in page for Best Buy's website. It includes fields for email address and password, with an option to reveal the password. Users can sign in with their credentials, use a passkey, or log in via Apple or Google accounts. There is a link for password recovery and a prompt for new users to check out as guests. Terms and conditions are also linked below the login options.
